description: User successfully completes the sign-up process with email and password
User successfully logs in via email/password or Google OAuth
User clicks to authenticate with Google OAuth
User creates a new AI scout from the home page or scouts list
Scout configuration is complete with all required fields (title, goal, description, location, search queries, frequency)
User activates a fully configured scout to start automated monitoring
User manually triggers a scout execution run
User deletes a scout from their scouts list
User regenerates their Firecrawl API key from settings
User sends a test notification email from settings
User updates their default location in settings
User clears all execution history for a scout
